message: Hi Bob, I have a great product that I think you'll love. I'm willing to sell it to you for $140. What do you think?
I'm interested in the product, but I was thinking more along the lines of $130. Would you be willing to meet me halfway?
I can do $135, but I was thinking more along the lines of $140. I'm willing to meet you halfway, but I need to make a profit
I appreciate your willingness to meet me halfway, but I'm still a bit above my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $132? That's the lowest I can go.
I can do $138, but I'm still a bit above your budget. I'm willing to meet you halfway again, but I need to make a profit
I understand you need to make a profit, but I'm really close to my budget. Would you be willing to go down to $135? That's as low as I can go.
